entry.title: Exclusive: Armenia declines to say if it considers 2020 ceasefire still in force

media:group.media:title: Exclusive: Armenia declines to say if it considers 2020 ceasefire still in force
media:group.media:description:
๐A senior Azerbaijani official cast doubt on his countryโs willingness to engage in Western-mediated peace talks with Armenia, amid a widening gulf between Yerevan and Baku over competing European- and Russian-led negotiation tracks. ๐Armenia confirmed it sent Azerbaijan its latest peace treaty proposal. ๐Azerbaijan brought war crimes charges against Rashid Beglaryan, a 61-year-old Armenian civilian from Karabakh held in detention in the country. ๐Armeniaโs Foreign Ministry declined to tell CivilNet if it still considered the ceasefire declaration that ended the 2020 Karabakh war to still be in force.

entry.title: Rerooted: Collecting and preserving the stories of Karabakh Armenians

media:group.media:title: Rerooted: Collecting and preserving the stories of Karabakh Armenians
media:group.media:description:
Ani Schug, cofounder of Rerooted sits down with CivilNetโs Mark Dovich to talk about how she and her team are working to collect oral histories from Nagorno-Karabakh Armenians โ and why now is the right time to do so. Rerooted is a project that preserves testimonies from Armenian communities around the world.
0:00 How is Rerooted working with Artsakhโs Armenians? 3:53 What can be done to document alleged atrocities? 6:19 Why is now the time to collect testimonies from Artsakh? 9:00 Where is Rerooted going next?

entry.title: โWe owe it to our ancestors and future generations to regroup and rebuildโ, Dr. Garo Armen

media:group.media:title: โWe owe it to our ancestors and future generations to regroup and rebuildโ, Dr. Garo Armen
media:group.media:description:
In this episode, we delve into Dr. Garo Armen's life, from his childhood experiences in Istanbul to his life as a successful scientist, entrepreneur, and philanthropist in the US and Armenia. We explore some factors and people who inspired him to work, build and succeed in the bio-chemical and biotech industries and his philosophy behind success, leadership, money, power, and the meaning of life. Finally, Dr. Armen shares his view on where the world is headed, the challenges and hardships, and his hopes for the future.
About Dr. Garo Armen Dr. Garo Armen is an American-Armenian scientist, businessman and entrepreneur. He serves as Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Agenus Inc., which he co-founded in 1994. He is also the founder of the Children of Armenia Fund (COAF). He currently acts as Chairman of the Board of Protagenic Therapeutics. He has been at the head of seven different companies, most of which are in the business of advancing scientific technologies and immunotherapeutic products in the cure for cancer. Dr. Armen received his Ph.D. in physical chemistry from the City University of New York. In addition, he is the recipient of several prestigious awards and honors, including the Ellis Island Medal of honor for his humanitarian efforts in Armenia and contribution to American society, the Medal of Honor from the Prime Minister of the Republic of Armenia for his contribution in revitalizing rural communities in Armenia, and the Mkhitar Heratsi Medal from the President of Armenia for services to the development of healthcare in Armenia.
Program overview Mindful Leaders dives into the stories of people who have achieved prominence, walked incredible journeys, and have defined culture.
Lara sits down with specialists, thinkers and change-catalysts to deconstruct insights, events and lessons that have shaped their personal and professional lives and have enabled them to create meaning and connection.

media:group.media:title: ยซีีฟีฅึีกีถีกีฏีฅึีฟีซ ีบีกีตีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีบีกีฟีฅึีกีฆีด ีงึ ีบีกีฟีฅึีกีฆีดีซ ีดีฅีปยปโค ีขีชีซีทีฏีจี ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีพีฅึีปีซีถ ึ ึีฅึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถ
media:group.media:description:
ิฑึีฟีกีทีฅีฝ ีีกีตีซีตีกีถีจ ีดีฅีฏีถ ีง ีกึึีกีญึีซ ีกีตีถ ีขีชีซีทีฏีถีฅึีซึ, ีธึีธีถึ ีดีซีถีนึ ีพีฅึีปีซีถ ึ ึีถ ีกีทีญีกีฟีฅีฌ ีฅีถ ิฑึึีกีญีธึีดึ ิตึีฅึ ีบีกีฟีฅึีกีฆีด ีง ีฟีฅีฝีฅีฌ ีธึีบีฅีฝ ีขีชีซีทีฏ, ีซีฝีฏ ีบีกีตีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีถึีก ีฐีกีดีกึ ีนีธึึีธึีค ีบีกีฟีฅึีกีฆีดีถ ีงึึ ีีฅีฏึ ึีตีก ีบีกีฟีฅึีกีฆีดีซ ีฐีฅีฟึีกีถึีถีฅึีจ ีคีฅีผ ีนีดีกึีฝีกีฎี ีฝีฅีบีฟีฅีดีขีฅึีซ 25-ีซีถ ีฟีฅีฒีซ ีธึีถีฅึีกีพ ีขีฅีถีฆีกีฌึีกีฏีกีตีกีถีซ ีบีกีตีฉีตีธึีถีจ, ีธึีซ ีฐีฅีฟึีกีถึีธีพ ีฐีกึีตีธึึีกีพีธึ ีฆีธีฐีฅึ ีธึ ีพีซึีกีพีธึีถีฅึ ีฃึีกีถึีพีฅึีซีถึ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด ีีกีตีซีตีกีถีจ ีบีกีฟีดีธึีด ีง, ีฉีฅ ีซีถีน ีงึ ีฏีกีฟีกึีพีธึีด ีฐีซีพีกีถีคีกีถีธึีธึีด ีกีตีค ึ ึีฅึีซีถ ึ ีซีถีนีบีฅีฝ ีงีซีถ ึีธึีฑีธึีด ึ ีฃีถีฅีฌ ีพีซึีกีพีธึีถีฅึีซีถึ

entry.title: World Court orders Azerbaijan to allow Karabakh Armenians back home

media:group.media:title: World Court orders Azerbaijan to allow Karabakh Armenians back home
media:group.media:description:
๐The United Nationsโ top court ordered Azerbaijan to guarantee the safety of Armenians who wish to return to their homes in Karabakh after their forced displacement from the region in September. ๐One Armenian soldier reportedly suffered non-life-threatening injuries when Azerbaijani units opened fire on Armeniaโs Ararat region, marking the first such incident since the fall of Karabakh. ๐A senior European Union diplomat expressed his support for the rights of Karabakh Armenians to return to their homes.

entry.title: Beyond Survival: Crafting a Narrative of Armenian Innovation

media:group.media:title: Beyond Survival: Crafting a Narrative of Armenian Innovation
media:group.media:description:
In this podcast, comedian Kev Orkian discusses his new documentary exploring Armenian identity. He shares his perspective on forging a contemporary Armenian narrative focused on achievement over victimhood. Orkian also opens up about his desire to move to Armenia and his thoughts on connections between the diaspora and homeland.

media:group.media:description:
ิฑีี-ีจ ีคีกีฝ ีง ีฟีกีฌีซีฝ ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีซีถ, ึ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ีบีฅีฟึ ีง ีฏีกึีธีฒีกีถีก ึ ีฃีฟีพีฅีฌ ีกีตีฝ ีฐีถีกึีกีพีธึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีซึ, ีกีฝีธึีด ีง ีกีดีฅึีซีฏีกีฐีกีต ีฐีกีฝีกึีกีฏีกีฏีกีถ-ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีฃีธึีฎีซีน ีีซีฃีงีถ ี ีธีพีฝีงึีฅีกีถีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด: ีึีก ีญีธีฝึีธีพี ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีถ ีกีตีชีด ีบีฅีฟึ ีง ีฏีกึีธีฒีกีถีก ีฟีฅึ ีฏีกีถีฃีถีฅีฌ ิฑึึีดีธึีฟึีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีดีฅึีฑีฅึีดีกีถ ีซึ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถีจ ึ ีฐีฅีฟึีกีตีฌ ีนีฏีกีฟีกึีฅีฌ: ิฑีตีฝ ีกีผีธึีดีธีพ ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีซีถ ีฟึีกีดีกีคึีพีธีฒ ีผีกีฆีดีกีฏีกีถ ึ ีชีกีถีคีกีฏีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฝีกีฐีดีกีถีกึีกีฏีธึีดีจ ีถีก ีฐีกีดีกึีธึีด ีง ีีกีทีซีถีฃีฟีธีถีซ ีญีธึีฐึีคีกีถีทีกีฏีกีถ ึีกีตีฌีจ:

entry.title: ิฒีฅีดีกีคึีพีกีฎ ีคีกีฟีกีพีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึ ึ ีกีถีฟีฅีฝีพีกีฎ ีดีซีปีกีฆีฃีกีตีซีถ ีซึีกีพีธึีถึโค ีฐีกีตีฅึีจี ิฒีกึีพีธึีด

media:group.media:title: ิฒีฅีดีกีคึีพีกีฎ ีคีกีฟีกีพีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึ ึ ีกีถีฟีฅีฝีพีกีฎ ีดีซีปีกีฆีฃีกีตีซีถ ีซึีกีพีธึีถึโค ีฐีกีตีฅึีจี ิฒีกึีพีธึีด
media:group.media:description:
ิฑีตีฝ ีบีกีฐีซีถ ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีธึีด ีกีถีกีฆีกีฟีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีดีฅีป ีบีกีฐีพีธีฒ ีฐีกีตีฅึีซ ีบีกีทีฟีธีถีกีฏีกีถ ีฉีซีพีจ 55 ีงึ ีึีกีถึ ีธึีถีฅีถ ีซึีกีพีกีฏีกีถ ีฟีกึีขีฅึ ีผีฅีชีซีดีถีฅึโค ีฐีซีดีถีกีฏีกีถ ีญีธึีดีขีจ ีผีกีฆีดีกีฃีฅึีซีถีฅึีถ ีธึ ึีกีฒีกึีกึีซีกีฏีกีถ ีฃีฅึีซีถีฅึีถ ีฅีถ, ีดีตีธึีฝ ีญีธึีดีขีจี ึีกีฒีขีกีถีฟีกึีฏีตีกีฌีถีฅึีจโค ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีถีบีกีฟีกีฏีธีพ ีฐีฅีฟีกีบีถีคีดีกีถ ีฅีถีฉีกึีฏีพีธีฒ ึีกีฒีกึีกึีซีกีฏีกีถ ีกีถีฑีซีถึึ ีีฅีฏ ีกีตีฌ ีญีธึีดีข ีฅีถ ีฏีกีฆีดีธึีด ีฃีฅึีฅีพีกึีดีกีถ ีกีตีถ ีคีฅีบึีฅึีจ, ีธึีธีถึ ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีจ ีบีกีทีฟีธีถีกีบีฅีฝ ีนีซ ีจีถีคีธึีถีธึีดึ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีจ ีฆึีธึึีฅึ ีซึีกีพีกีบีกีทีฟีบีกีถีถีฅึีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ึ ึีธึีฑีฅึ ีบีกึีฆีฅีฌี ีซีถีน ีซึีกีพีกีฏีกีถ ึ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีฃีธึีฎีซึีถีฅึ ีฏีกีถ ีกีตีค ีดีกึีคีฏีกีถึ ีพีฅึีกีคีกึีฑีถีฅีฌีธึ ีฐีกีดีกึึ
